item.title: George w bush
item.dc:creator: @Got_Shine Got_Shine
item.description:
@Got_Shine wrote:

[quote=“Taylor, post:8, topic:19913”][quote author=wall of fir link=topic=30198.msg348362#msg348362 date=1161794349]
You LIKE our troops killing all iraq?you LIKE us going in there for no reason?
[/quote]They are not actually killing iraqi, the iraqi are killing their own country and Americans is trying to bring peace for Iraq.

Edit: Also I voted No.[/quote]But its none of our business, if they were killing eachother on our country’s turf, thats our business. There is no reason to be in iraq right now except to finish his father’s oil job.

We should be more agressive with saudi arabia right now, seeing as the are cutting oil pumping 1 million raw barrels a day in an effort to pressure US and up the gas prices.

Read full topic

I voted for Bush, and I would do so again.
[/quote] You LIKE our troops killing all iraq?you LIKE us going in there for no reason?[/quote]

Mopar is stubborn he will never change his political views, no matter how sadistic Bush is. :rolleyes:

item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

[quote=“Sticks_, post:9, topic:19913”]Well im with Frank_, Kid you do relize thats the only thing people Have been complaining about for over 4 years already. Think of something else to Complain about and you may not be alone on this one. :o[/quote]Oh, believe me there are enough things people have been complaining about. Most I’m sure have already been posted in the other debate topics…But anyway, wall of fir, that was the result of a decision, not really that of a single person.

I’m moving this to discussions and debates though, as it probably will turn into one.
